thread.title: Chrissy Teigen Had the Best Reaction When the Golden Globes Spelled John Legend's Name Wrong
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen Had the Best Reaction When the Golden Globes Spelled John Legend's Name Wrong

title: Chrissy Teigen Had the Best Reaction When the Golden Globes Spelled John Legend's Name Wrong
text:
Chrissy Teigen Had the Best Reaction When the Golden Globes Spelled John Legend's Name Wrong 
#RelationshipGoals. By Gina Mei Jan 8, 2017 You would think by now that basically every person on the planet knows John Legend's name — but as it turns out, "basically every person" doesn't include whoever was responsible for writing out the place cards at the 2017 Golden Globes. After realizing her husband's name had been spelled "John Ledgend" at their table on Sunday night, Chrissy Teigen decided to respond in the most hilarious way: by making fun of him for it on Twitter. Along with a photo of the singer-songwriter showing his obvious displeasure over the misspelling, Chrissy decided to really twist the knife by captioning it, "Bahahaha loser." Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) January 9, 2017 Could they be a more epic couple? I think not.
